attributes.action: To all Conservative MP's, do not re-elect Boris Johnson as PM of the UK
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to withdraw his candidacy, and to block any such future scenarios when an MP is under investigation.
attributes.background: We want the Conservative MPs to not show thier support for Boris Johnsons bid to re-elected Prime Minister. He is the reason for the political chaos that we have witnessed. He has embarrassed the United Kingdom on the world stage, and is proven that he is unfit for the power that the position holds.

rejection.details: Decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
